title: Report Riot for nerfing Fiora's ult
body:
And report everyone who thinks it's good that she's ruined. 

Hang the developers up by their toenails for ruining the 1st e-sport and curse their offspring. 

May you wake up in the mirror and look at the person who destroyed Leauge of legends. 

Her double lunge was stolen from her and nerfed. 

Her lunge was everything. 

I hate you for it. 

I hate everyone who likes her for talking like they know anything about Fiora or this game.

You know nothing. 

You are all worse than fleas...

  Numerous in your opinions and just as annoying.

replies.body:
I pity sheep who treat PBE changes as golden tickets to bitch.

In other words go fuck yourself.

> [{quoted}](name=Matake,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=82s1Jhz1,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2017-02-01T03:03:39.181+0000)
>
> I pity sheep who treat PBE changes as golden tickets to bitch.
> 
> In other words go fuck yourself.

^
I don't think those are reportable offenses. Even if you reported them, nothing would really happen. They aren't breaking the summoner's code.
Just when u think Janna mains are the worst a fiora player comes to tell u they couldn't handle their champ get nerfs they have deserved for far too long
is shitposting all you know how to do

MEH MEH MEH I PLAY FIORA AND MY JANNA ULT WAS NERFED MEH MEH MEH. listen up buddy, you gotta learn the truth. fiora's ulti is broken as fuck, no bruiser should be able to heal like a support, especially if said move scales ad, if fiora ult duration was 2 seconds, and scaled AP rather than AD and they upped the flat amout abit, THATS when we'd have a nice ulti. I don't wanna have to build {{item:3085}} {{item:3033}} on {{champion:119}}  to counter than shit, and besides, you'll be killing me in half a second anyways so whats the point. 

tl;dr the nerfs are important, not as important as > {{champion:126}} < THIS %%%GOT but still it makes the game, a wee bit more Playable for adc's
Leeches who suck the life from the game.
